item.title: Entertainment
item.description: Most people visit Taniti to enjoy the beautiful beaches, explore the lushes rainforest, and visit the active volcano. However, there are other things to do.

item.title: Other Activities
item.description: There is a load to do during your visit. There are over twenty-five local tour companies who can help schedule activities that will expand your mind.

item.title: Sightseeing
item.description: Most tourists spend most of their time in Taniti City, which boasts native architecture and nearby white, sandy beaches that encircle Yellow Leaf Bay.
